document_data.caption2: Endcliff Tower depicted on a map of Waterdeep, ca. [[1368 DR]]
document_data.name: Endcliff Tower
document_data.mainbody: '''Endcliff Tower''' was one of the major torchtowers of [[Waterdeep]]'s [[Trollwall]], located in the city's [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]].Every tower connected to the Trollwall falls under the designation of "torchtower."<ref group="note" name="major">The sourcebook ''[[City System]]'' states that all torchtowers with names are "major towns".
document_data.Location: This tower stood on [[Saerdoun Street]], directly across from [[Endcliff Lane]] and just north of [[Zun Villa]].

Structure.Interior: Being a torchtower,<ref group="note" name="torchtower" /> Endcliff Tower had all the features that were common among them. This included a debriefing room, a small armory, holding cells, storage rooms for the holding of evidence or confiscated items, some bedchambers, and some garderobes.{{Cite web/theedverse/2021-10-17 - Waterdeep's Torchtowers}} Additionally, being a major torchtower, it had six small holding cells that could hold up to ten people, which were used in times of trouble.<ref><ref group="note" name="major" />

document_data.Activities: Like all other torchtowers, this structure had three beacon-fires that were constantly kept on standby.
document_data.Inhabitants: Endcliff Tower, like all torchtowers, was manned by members of the City Watch, who carefully watched over the edge of Cliffwatch for any sign of invasion.
